about_the_game:
The chainsaw-wielding cheerleader Juliet Starling returns in Lollipop Chainsaw RePOP! Rip and tear through an army of the living dead like never before in this remastered version of the zany over-the-top cult classic!

Boasting upgraded graphics, 4K support, improved controls, faster action, new difficulty modes, and loads of quality-of-life improvements, Lollipop Chainsaw RePOP doesn’t just bring back what fans loved – it cranks it all up to eleven!

A cheerleader takes on the undead in this zany over-the-top zombie-slaying adventure!

San Romero High School has been overrun by zombies, and it’s up to cheerleader Juliet to save the day. But Juliet isn’t just any high school cheerleader: As part of a legendary family of zombie hunters, she’s more than equipped to fight the undead hordes! Using her acrobatic cheerleading skills, zombie-slaying expertise, and a seriously powerful chainsaw, she’ll face down an army of the living dead and the evil forces behind them!

Rip and tear through hordes of zombies - with style!

Lollipop Chainsaw RePOP cranks up the intensity with the all-new Chain Hit Hunting system, which lets you build up massive combo streaks, speeding up the action as you swing. The higher your combo, the faster and deadlier Juliet becomes, making each encounter a breathtaking ballet of blades and blood!

And with the newly revamped Chainsaw Blaster, you can shoot your way through the chaos like never before! Rapid-fire, improved lock-ons, and auto-ammo pickup make it easier than ever to keep the pressure on. Combined with refined controls and faster action, every move feels smoother, and more fluid and satisfying.

Face the the Dark Purveyors - ridiculous rotting rock stars!

Prepare for some of the wildest boss battles you've ever seen! The Dark Purveyors are not your average zombies — they're twisted, genre-defying bosses that bring their own brand of madness to the battlefield!

Each boss has their own unique deadly styles and powers that make them formidable foes—like Mariska's psychedelic illusions or Josey’s funky grooves that warp the very battlefield around you. Every clash is more than just a fight; it’s an epic showdown against the most deranged supernatural forces ever to walk the earth. Think you’ve got what it takes to defeat these rotting rock stars? It’s time to find out!

Revamped minigames bring variety to killing zombies!

Lollipop Chainsaw RePOP revises the minigame lineup with improvements to keep things fun! Whether you're launching zombie heads through a basketball hoop or trying your hand at zombie baseball, everything now feels tighter and more intuitive. More explanations and tips will help players understand the rules from the get-go, making it easy to dive in and start scoring straight away. Each minigame has been tweaked to deliver a high level of wild and wacky gameplay consistent with the rest of the game while adding variety to your zombie-slaying adventure!

Juliet’s amazing new wardrobe is to die for!

Juliet’s wardrobe is bursting with costumes, adding jaw-dropping new designs to the lineup alongside fan favorites from the original game. Choose from these stylish outfits to ensure that Juliet is always dressed to impress!

But that’s not all—You can even give Juliet’s chainsaw a makeover! Choose from a variety of new chainsaw designs to fit your personal flair and maximize your undead-busting power. And don’t forget the new hair color options! Change Juliet’s look to match your mood and make every chainsaw swing a statement!

Who ever knew that killing zombies could be so colorful?

You can choose to stick with the same intense, blood-soaked spectacle from the original game if you prefer, but if you’re ready to see Juliet’s chainsaw action in a whole new light, check out the new RePOP mode! Enjoy the same thrilling gameplay, now with a splash of pop art aesthetic, where damage effects are replaced with vivid, vibrant sparkling effects. It’s a bold new look that adds extra flair to the zombie-slaying fun!

Lollipop Chainsaw's music has also been revamped in RePOP, with a load of awesome new compositions from acclaimed composers known for their work in video games and anime. These new tracks, alongside the upgraded visuals, offer a refreshing, remixed twist on the game!

The whole game is packed with improvements!

Lollipop Chainsaw RePOP is packed with upgrades to give you a smoother, more responsive, and better-looking zombie-slaying experience! Dive into the action with dramatically reduced load times, an improved camera, and enhanced input responsiveness. The new auto-play feature for QTEs lets you focus on the action without missing a beat, and 4K/60 FPS support means that the action will look way better too!

highlighted.name: I Came, I Saw, I Kicked Its Ass
I Swear! I Did It By Mistake!

content_descriptors.notes:
Lollipop Chainsaw RePOP contains blood, gore, intense violence, strong language, and suggestive themes.
This product also includes revealing costumes.

name: LOLLIPOP CHAINSAW RePOP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060(6GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX3060(8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
